[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@elux/react-web](./react-web.md) &gt; [PagenameMap](./react-web.pagenamemap.md)

## PagenameMap type

定义路由Page及映射PathParams

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PagenameMap<TPagenames extends string = string> = {
    [K in TPagenames]: {
        pathToParams(pathArgs: Array<string | undefined>): Record<string, any>;
        paramsToPath(params: Record<string, any>): Array<string | undefined>;
        pageComponent?: any;
    };
};
```

## Remarks

[EluxLocation.pathmatch](./react-web.eluxlocation.pathmatch.md) 中可以隐式的映射某些 params 参数（可称之为 `PathParams`<!-- -->），此处定义如何提取和还原 PathParams

- key 名即为 [RouteState.pagename](./react-web.routestate.pagename.md)

- `pathToParams` 提取 [EluxLocation.pathmatch](./react-web.eluxlocation.pathmatch.md) 中的传参，并映射成为 `PathParams`<!-- -->，并与 [EluxLocation.args](./react-web.eluxlocation.args.md) 合并后作为 [StateLocation.payload](./react-web.statelocation.payload.md)

- `paramsToPath` 将 [StateLocation.payload](./react-web.statelocation.payload.md) 中的某些参数作为 `PathParams`<!-- -->，放入 [EluxLocation.pathmatch](./react-web.eluxlocation.pathmatch.md) 中储存

- `pageComponent` 通常无需设置，如需特别指定该Page的UI组件，可在此定义
